sentences: Ruti Olajugbagbe (born 20 September 1999) is an English singer-songwriter.
After winning the seventh series of The Voice UK, she released her debut EP Racing Cars in 2019.
In 2018, Olajugbagbe auditioned for The Voice UK, and joined Sir Tom Jones's team.
On 5 April 2019, Olajugbagbe released her debut extended play, Racing Cars, through Polydor.
In September 2021 Olajugbagbe said that she had signed a Publishing deal with Sony Music Publishing.
In November 2021 Olajugbagbe also Announced on her Instagram Page that she had signed a new Record Deal with PMR Records Part of the Universal Music Group.
